DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study test effect safety three different dos ABT-143 compare simvastatin subject elevate level low density lipoprotein cholesterol ( `` bad cholesterol '' ) triglyceride .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Comparing ABT-143 Simvastatin Subjects With Elevated Levels Low Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol ( `` Bad Cholesterol '' ) Triglycerides
DOC.detailed_description: There 4 treatment group study : ABT-143 capsule 20/135 mg , ABT-143 capsule 10/135 mg , ABT-143 5/135 mg , simvastatin capsule 40 mg . The primary outcome measure compare 2 group : ABT-143 capsule 20/135 mg simvastatin capsule 40 mg group , therefore result 2 group 4 group outcome measure . Secondary outcome measure ( mean percent change LDL-C compare ABT-143 capsule 10/135 mg simvastatin capsule 40 mg ) compare 2 group : ABT-143 capsule 10/135 mg simvastatin capsule 40 mg , therefore result 2 group 4 group outcome measure . Secondary outcome measure ( mean percent change LDL-C compare ABT-143 capsule 5/135 mg simvastatin capsule 40 mg ) compare 2 group : ABT-143 capsule 5/135 mg simvastatin capsule 40 mg , therefore result 2 group 4 group outcome measure . For pre-specified outcome measure , median percent change triglyceride baseline final visit mean percent change HDL-C baseline final visit full analysis set , 3 ABT-143 capsule 20/135 mg , 10/135 mg , 5/135 mg group compare simvastatin capsule 40 mg group , therefore result 4 treatment group outcome measure .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Participants hypercholesterolemia hypertriglyceridemia . Participants follow fast lipid result follow great equal 12 hour fasting period ( measure Screening Visit ( ) ) : Triglycerides level great equal 150 milligrams/deciliter ( mg/dL ) less 400 milligrams/deciliter , Lowdensity lipoprotein cholesterol great equal 160 milligrams/deciliter less equal 240 milligrams/deciliter . Exclusion Criteria Participants certain chronic unstable medical condition . Participants receive coumarin anticoagulant , systemic cyclosporins , certain medication . Pregnant lactate woman , woman intend become pregnant . Participants diabetes mellitus poorly control . Participant Asian ancestry ( Filipino , Chinese , Japanese , Korean , Vietnamese , AsianIndian origin ) .
